channel.title: The WhichBingo.co.uk Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: The WhichBingo UK Podcast is the first podcast ever to be dedicated to UK online bingo.
channel.itunes:author: George Cotter
channel.itunes:summary: The WhichBingo UK Podcast is the first podcast ever to be dedicated to UK online bingo. Each month, we will be rounding up the latest news and goings on from around the online bingo world and taking a look at what's new on WhichBingo UK.
channel.description: The WhichBingo UK Podcast is the first podcast ever to be dedicated to UK online bingo. Each month, we will be rounding up the latest news and goings on from around the online bingo world and taking a look at what's new on WhichBingo UK. Leading figures from the online bingo industry will join us for exclusive interviews, giving you the chance to hear what is happening behind the scenes at your favourite online bingo sites.
